label: 鎮西奉行
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: A designation for the two Kamakura commissioners for Kyūshū. Purportedly held by the Ōtomo and Shōji (originally Mutō) families, though recent scholarship raises many questions concerning this title. Superseded by the Chinzei tandai.　[大友、少弐（武藤）、鎮西探題]
